name: Dice Dobble
description:
This game is made for gmtk 2022

Dice dobble is a puzzle game where you have to match the number on the dice and the tile

move with wasd or the arrow keys or a gamepad!

press R to restart and space to go to next level

Programming and level design by: JSaurusRex

Level design and music by: daredevil28

Level design by: MrMoevie
